TopicTitle: Food and Water in Career mode

Articles.Content: I would like to see food and water in career mode, so my Progress Unmanned spacecraft have a good use, except for being big satellites in orbit just to show off. And yes, I know about TAC life support. But I would love to see it in the Vanilla game. Maybe make a special container with the shape of the Rockomax Brand Adapter.

Life support of some kind is on the do not suggest list, but I, too, would like it in the stock game. I don't know if stock KSP needs such non-abstracted resources though, maybe just having a generic "Life Support" resource and a "Waste" resource would be good enough.

As regex said, Life Support is on the what not to suggest list. Whether it's going to be implemented or not, it has been suggested many times without much constructive discussion.

So since it is on the what not to suggest list, thread locked. Have a nice day.
